response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value and the unique features it offers, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. Considering its market worth and the benefits it provides, I am extending a special offer for you to purchase the product at a price of $14,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best value while also allowing us to maximize the product's worth. Should you decide to accept this offer, we promise a seamless transaction and exceptional customer service. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 14000}
